ing: 2 tablespoons chopped almonds, or to taste
n: Mrs. McG's Vegan Peanut Butter Banana Ice Cream
des: "This is a quick and easy vegan ice cream dish I created for some in-laws who are on a vegan diet. My husband added mini-chocolate chips (not vegan) and said this ice cream almost tasted like cookie dough! This recipe is much more healthy than traditional ice cream. Be sure to give it a try. Enjoy!"
ins: Process bananas, peanut butter, vanilla extract, and ground cinnamon together in a food processor, pausing to scrape down the sides occasionally, until smooth. Add soy milk and blend until smooth. Scoop into bowls and top with chopped almonds.
